name: Ambitions of Azateim (Demo)
description:
Raised as a Knight of Francia, Mélodie finds herself in an unfamiliar part of the world, or perhaps an entirely different world, after being struck down in a war for her country. Lacking even basic communication ability due to a language barrier, Mélodie is aided by the young Diviner and shrine maiden, Sachiko. Sachiko's Light magic allows a temporary ability to speak and understand the language of this New World, but the pair must work together to find a permanent solution in order for Mélodie to stand on her own.

Yet, Mélodie may not have to stand alone against the trials ahead. Sachiko's path is an unsafe one, and a looming threat will require more than a naïve pair to stave off the forces lurking in both the Darkness of night, and the Light of day. Enlisting the help of an epicene Boxer, a vengeful Princess, and a maniacal Water Mage, with several more allies rallying behind them, this unexpected band of adventurers may halt the outbreak of a war to end all wars.

Ambitions of Azateim is a Japanese Role-Playing Game (JRPG) built in RPG Maker MV. Its turn-based battle system allows the player to apply careful planning to each move made, rewarding a tactical mindset over raw stat numbers. Overcome foes of the living, mechanical, and spiritual.

Guide Mélodie through a deep tale that spans across nations, with party members you meet coming from diverse homes and upbringings. In pursuit of their own personal goals, they find common ground to work together. With your direction, these five young adults can give the world around them a new shape.
